Package com.Game

Class Scene

java.lang.Object
com.Game.Scene
Direct Known Subclasses:
CreateNewLevelMenu, InfoScene, Level1Menu, Level2Menu, Level3Menu, Level4Menu, LevelEditorScene, LevelScene, MainMenuScene, OptionSelectMenu
public abstract class Scene extends Object
Abstract class that holds the methods that all the scenes will need
